title: Build a Sync Status Widget
description: Create a widget that displays sync status with appropriate icons and colors.
instructions: Implement a SyncBadge widget that shows different icons for synced (green check), pending (orange clock), and failed (red X) states.

testCases.description: Uses switch statement for state handling

hints: Use a switch statement to handle each SyncState
Icons.check_circle is good for synced state
Use appropriate colors: green for success, orange for pending, red for failed
